DOC.brief_summary: To compare the effects of vilazodone, paroxetine and placebo on sexual function in sexually active healthy adults.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Sexual Functioning of Healthy Adults After Receiving Vilazodone, Paroxetine or Placebo
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or female, aged 18 through 45 years, inclusive Currently sexually active If female, non pregnant and agree to use acceptable for of contraception during If male, be sterile or have partner use contraception. Have sexual dysfunction Have history of diagnosis or treatment of any disorder related to sexual functioning. Clinically significant disease state, in the opinion of the examining physician, in any body system History of alcohol or other substance abuse or dependence within the previous 5 years
